resources.string: Please rotate your device one time and clockwise. Once succeeded check the box.
Hi! We are the IaMHUM@n team. We are doing an experiment about mobile CAPTCHAs. Therefore we explore 3 different options.

By clicking 'continue' below you indicate that you understand and consent to the following: 
 
• This application was built for research purposes. It is not meant to be used outside of the study. 
• No personal data is collected. The data collection is limited to data relevant to our study, so performance related data is collected. 
• All collected data is stored to a unique anonymized identifier. 
• All data will be deleted half a year after it is collected, or the study ends, whichever is sooner. 
 
The experiment takes about 15 minutes. 
 
For more information contact: a.dimitriou1@students.uu.nl
I consent that my information is not stored.
This is the text you have to fill in.
Thank you for participating in our study!
The application will terminate automatically soon.
CAPTCHAs were invented to block spammy software from posting comments on pages or purchasing excess items at once.
The first task is the most common form of CAPTCHA, an image with several distorted letters. For this task, you will have to fill in the letters shown in the picture into the respective field.
The next type of CAPTCHA is an innovative way to block spammy software.
In order to successfully complete this CAPTCHA you have to approach your palm close to the phone until the RED square turns to GREEN.
In order to successfully complete this CAPTCHA you have to rotate your phone clockwise for 180 degrees. Be aware to switch off the auto rotate mode of your phone!
The input in the following form (name, surname, e-mail) will not be stored. You should use the same input for all the following CAPTCHAs.
The input in the following form (name, surname, e-mail) will not be stored. Please use the same input as in the previous task.
After the CAPTCHA task, you will have to answer a questionnaire about the usability of it. Please give honest feedback.
Please score the following 10 items with one of five responses that range from 1 (= Strongly Disagree) to 5 (= Strongly Agree) for the captcha you just completed.
Question 1: I think that I would like to use this system frequently.
Question 2: I found the system unnecessarily complex.
Question 3: I thought the system was easy to use.
Question 4: I think that I would need the support of a technical person to be able to use this system.
Question 5: I found the various functions in this system were well integrated.
Question 6: I thought there was too much inconsistency in this system.
Question 7: I would imagine that most people would learn to use this system very quickly.
Question 8: I found the system very cumbersome to use.
Question 9: I felt very confident using the system.
Question 10: I needed to learn a lot of things before I could get going with this system.
Finally, we would like to have some demographic information from you.
What is your handedness / preferred hand?
